harumiWeb/exstruct

Extracts structured data from Excel for LLM pipelines

Related repos

  • WebAssembly build of the Go Excelize library
  • Structured data extraction for LLMs
  • visually chunks and parses complex documents for LLMs, with markdown and table support
  • Excel agent using MCP tools for LLMs to automate spreadsheets
  • Transforms unstructured text into knowledge graphs for LLM-powered data analysis
  • Tool for creating, editing, and exporting fine-tuning datasets for LLMs with document processing and multiple export formats
  • turns documents into LLM-ready data chunks
  • Extracts JSON from documents using LLMs
  • Web scraping tool for LLM-ready data
